title: Before & After
description: What comes before or after? Test your sequential memory and knowledge!

questions.question: In the alphabet, what letter comes immediately after 'M'?
questions.explanation: The sequence goes L, M, N, O — so N comes right after M in the English alphabet.

questions.question: What month comes immediately after June?
questions.explanation: July follows June in the calendar. July is the seventh month of the year.

questions.question: What day of the week comes immediately before Thursday?
questions.explanation: Wednesday comes just before Thursday in the days of the week.

questions.question: What season comes immediately after winter?
questions.explanation: Spring follows winter in the seasonal cycle: spring, summer, autumn (fall), winter.

questions.question: In the rainbow color sequence (ROYGBIV), what color comes immediately after orange?
questions.explanation: The rainbow sequence is Red, Orange, Yellow, Green, Blue, Indigo, Violet — so yellow follows orange.

questions.question: In our solar system, which planet comes immediately after Earth when moving away from the Sun?
questions.explanation: The order from the Sun is Mercury, Venus, Earth, Mars — so Mars is the next planet after Earth.

questions.question: In the musical scale 'Do Re Mi Fa Sol La Ti,' what comes immediately after 'Fa'?
questions.explanation: The solfege scale goes Do, Re, Mi, Fa, Sol, La, Ti — so Sol comes right after Fa.

questions.question: Going clockwise on a compass, what cardinal direction comes immediately after North?
questions.explanation: Moving clockwise from North, the order is North, East, South, West — so East comes after North.

questions.question: What decade came immediately before the 1980s?
questions.explanation: The 1970s came immediately before the 1980s in chronological order.

questions.question: In Roman numerals, what number comes immediately after IX (9)?
questions.explanation: IX is 9 in Roman numerals, and the next number is X, which represents 10.

questions.question: In the zodiac, what sign comes immediately after Aries?
questions.explanation: The zodiac order begins Aries, Taurus, Gemini — so Taurus follows Aries.

questions.question: What month comes immediately before October?
questions.explanation: September is the ninth month and comes right before October, the tenth month.

questions.question: Which U.S. President served immediately before Abraham Lincoln?
questions.explanation: James Buchanan was the 15th President, serving from 1857 to 1861, immediately before Abraham Lincoln became the 16th President.

questions.question: In the standard order of the five Olympic ring colors from left to right, what color comes immediately after yellow?
questions.explanation: The Olympic rings from left to right on the top row are blue, black, red, and on the bottom row yellow, green — so green comes after yellow.

questions.question: In the alphabet, what letter comes immediately before 'Q'?
questions.explanation: The sequence goes O, P, Q, R — so P comes immediately before Q in the English alphabet.
